heroSection.subtitle: Get complete songs with cover art and music videos in two simple prompts.

demoSection.description: See how our AI transforms simple text into music experiences
promptExamples: Happy birthday song for Emma with jazz style
Epic rock anthem with guitar solos
Romantic ballad with piano and strings

faqs.question: Do I need musical experience?
faqs.answer: Not at all! Just type what you want in plain English, like 'happy birthday song' or 'relaxing piano music.' Our AI handles everything else.

faqs.question: How long does it take?
faqs.answer: Most songs are ready in 1â€“3 minutes. You'll get a complete song with cover art instantly.

faqs.question: Can I use the music commercially?
faqs.answer: Yes! Creator plan includes full commercial rights for YouTube, social media, client projects, and more.

faqs.question: What if I don't like the result?
faqs.answer: You can generate unlimited variations by tweaking your prompt or asking for different styles.

faqs.question: When is voice cloning available?
faqs.answer: Voice cloning is coming soon! You'll be able to upload any voice and have AI sing your songs in that voice.
